verses.verse: כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵ֣י <S%H335><s%> Where זֶ֠ה <S%H2088><s%> he סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Where [is] the bill כְּרִית֤וּת <S%H3748><s%> divorcement אִמְּכֶם֙ <S%H517><s%> of your mother's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שִׁלַּחְתִּ֔יהָ <S%H7971><s%> whom I have put away א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> and מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> to whom מִנּוֹשַׁ֔י <S%H5383><s%> ? or which of my creditors אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which מָכַ֥רְתִּי <S%H4376><s%> [is it] to whom I have sold אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> ל֑וֹ הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold בַּעֲוֹנֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5771><s%> you? Behold for your iniquities נִמְכַּרְתֶּ֔ם <S%H4376><s%> have ye sold וּבְפִשְׁעֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6588><s%> yourselves and for your transgressions שֻׁלְּחָ֥ה <S%H7971><s%> put away אִמְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H517><s%> is your mother

מַדּ֨וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why בָּ֜אתִי <S%H935><s%> Wherefore when I came וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> was there אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man קָרָֽאתִי֮ <S%H7121><s%> bewray וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no עוֹנֶה֒ <S%H6030><s%> [was there] none to answer הֲקָצ֨וֹר <S%H7114><s%> shortened קָצְרָ֤ה <S%H7114><s%> at all יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ? Is my hand מִפְּד֔וּת <S%H6304><s%> division וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> was there בִּ֥י כֹ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> power לְהַצִּ֑יל <S%H5337><s%> to deliver הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> behold בְּגַעֲרָתִ֞י <S%H1606><s%> ? behold at my rebuke אַחֲרִ֣יב <S%H2717><s%> I dry up יָ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea אָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> I make נְהָרוֹת֙ <S%H5104><s%> the rivers מִדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> a wilderness תִּבְאַ֤שׁ <S%H887><s%> stinketh דְּגָתָם֙ <S%H1710><s%> their fish מֵאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> none מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> because [there is] no water וְתָמֹ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> and dieth בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <S%H6772><s%> for thirst

אַלְבִּ֥ישׁ <S%H3847><s%> I clothe שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens קַדְר֑וּת <S%H6940><s%> with blackness וְשַׂ֖ק <S%H8242><s%> sackcloth אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> and I make כְּסוּתָֽם׃ <S%H3682><s%> their covering ס

אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> The Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD נָ֤תַן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לִי֙ לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> me the tongue לִמּוּדִ֔ים <S%H3928><s%> of the learned לָדַ֛עַת <S%H3045><s%> that I should know לָע֥וּת <S%H5790><s%> how to speak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָעֵ֖ף <S%H3287><s%> in season to [him that is] weary דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> a word יָעִ֣יר ׀ <S%H5782><s%> he wakeneth בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> by morning יָעִ֥יר <S%H5782><s%> he wakeneth לִי֙ אֹ֔זֶן <S%H241><s%> mine ear לִשְׁמֹ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> to hear כַּלִּמּוּדִֽים׃ <S%H3928><s%> as the learned

אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> The Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3068><s%> GOD פָּתַֽח־ <S%H6605><s%> hath opened לִ֣י אֹ֔זֶן <S%H241><s%> mine ear וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor מָרִ֑יתִי <S%H4784><s%> and I was not rebellious אָח֖וֹר <S%H268><s%> back לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נְסוּגֹֽתִי׃ <S%H5472><s%> neither turned away

גֵּוִי֙ <S%H1460><s%> my back נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I gave לְמַכִּ֔ים <S%H5221><s%> to the smiters וּלְחָיַ֖י <S%H3895><s%> and my cheeks לְמֹֽרְטִ֑ים <S%H4803><s%> to them that plucked off פָּנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> not my face לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִסְתַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H5641><s%> the hair I hid מִכְּלִמּ֖וֹת <S%H3639><s%> from shame וָרֹֽק׃ <S%H7536><s%> and spitting

וַאדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> For the Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַֽעֲזָר־ <S%H5826><s%> will help לִ֔י עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I am not נִכְלָ֑מְתִּי <S%H3637><s%> me therefore shall I not be confounded עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> after that שַׂ֤מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> therefore have I set פָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> my face כַּֽחַלָּמִ֔ישׁ <S%H2496><s%> like a flint וָאֵדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> and I know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אֵבֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H954><s%> that I shall not be ashamed

קָרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> [He is] near מַצְדִּיקִ֔י <S%H6663><s%> that justifieth מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יָרִ֥יב <S%H7378><s%> me who will contend אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> for נַ֣עַמְדָה <S%H5975><s%> with me? let us stand יָּ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> together מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who בַ֥עַל <S%H1167><s%> archer מִשְׁפָּטִ֖י <S%H4941><s%> adversary יִגַּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> draw אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> Behold the Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַֽעֲזָר־ <S%H5826><s%> will help לִ֔י מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> who יַרְשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <S%H7561><s%> me who [is] he [that] shall condemn הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> will all כַּבֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> as a garment יִבְל֔וּ <S%H1086><s%> me? lo they all shall wax old עָ֖שׁ <S%H6211><s%> the moth יֹאכְלֵֽם׃ <S%H398><s%> shall eat them up

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who בָכֶם֙ יְרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> Who [is] among you that feareth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> that obeyeth בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> of his servant אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> that הָלַ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that walketh חֲשֵׁכִ֗ים <S%H2825><s%> [in] darkness וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and has נֹ֙גַהּ֙ <S%H5051><s%> bright ל֔וֹ יִבְטַח֙ <S%H982><s%> be bold confident בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְיִשָּׁעֵ֖ן <S%H8172><s%> and stay בֵּאלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> upon his God

הֵ֧ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold כֻּלְּכֶ֛ם <S%H3605><s%> all קֹ֥דְחֵי <S%H6919><s%> Behold all ye that kindle אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire מְאַזְּרֵ֣י <S%H247><s%> that compass [yourselves] about זִיק֑וֹת <S%H2131><s%> with sparks לְכ֣וּ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> Walk בְּא֣וּר <S%H217><s%> in the light אֶשְׁכֶ֗ם <S%H784><s%> of your fire וּבְזִיקוֹת֙ <S%H2131><s%> and in the sparks בִּֽעַרְתֶּ֔ם <S%H1197><s%> [that] ye have kindled מִיָּדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> This shall ye have of mine hand הָיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> will have זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָכֶ֔ם לְמַעֲצֵבָ֖ה <S%H4620><s%> in sorrow תִּשְׁכָּבֽוּן׃ <S%H7901><s%> ye shall lie down פ
